item.title: 使用 rush 进行命令并行处理
item.description: rush 是一个类似于 GNU-parallel 的工具，提供了并行化命令的处理方案。 官方地址是：https://github.com/shenwei356/rush，该工具

item.title: 「翻译」在生物信息学中使用 GNU-Parallel
UCSCXenaTools: Retrieve Gene Expression and Clinical Information from UCSC Xena for Survival Analysis
item.description: I thank the edition made by Stefanie Butland. The UCSC Xena platform provides an unprecedented resource for public omics data from big projects like The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA), however, it is hard for users to incorporate multiple datasets or data types, integrate the selected data with popular analysis tools or homebrewed code, and reproduce analysis procedures. To address this issue, we developed an R package UCSCXenaTools for enabling data retrieval, analysis integration and reproducible research for omics data from the UCSC Xena platform1.
